vote.title: Authorize an increase to the twenty-four-month construction services contract for sidewalk and barrier free ramp installation paving services with Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting to extend the contract for an additional twelve months from the original period August 24, 2020 to August 24, 2022, now to extend to August 24, 2023 - Not to exceed $1,364,149.25, from $5,456,597.00 to $6,820,746.25 - Financing: Street and Transportation Improvements Fund (2006 and 2012 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize an increase to the twenty-four-month construction services contract for sidewalk and barrier free ramp installation paving services with Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting to extend the contract for an additional twelve months from the original period August 24, 2020 to August 24, 2022, now to extend to August 24, 2023 - Not to exceed $1,364,149.25, from $5,456,597.00 to $6,820,746.25 - Financing: Street and Transportation Improvements Fund (2006 and 2012 General Obligation Bond Fund)
